reviews.review: It is good game! I play this game a lot! Have a fun and make more friend
tem muitos hackers isso q eu nao gosto
i hope the vac work properly on whoever use hacks to win this game

Match making is something of a mixed bag, for serious players, they tend to prefer 3rd party servers. For casuals like me, we just play whatever CS:GO gives us. Cheater problem is a huge issue which we have been used to for so long that it is already numb for us, which is not a good sign. Game has good mechanics and requires strategy to win rounds, while also give some leeway for some run and gun-ers where they just run and shoot without having a strategy. Appreciate if Valve can focus on this game and update their match-making system and also change the tick-rate to 128, it's not 2012 anymore.
